group.error: Inclusion must be supported in parent element
Replacement element must be found in target inclusion
Functions based on inclusions must be applied to elements that have the same name
The value of @which must be either in the source or a reserved keyword.
<location> must point to an available document.
If there is no <location> then @which must be present.
Reference cannot be found in source
References must be atomic (no ranges, or atomic references joined by commas).
<div> has been realigned more than one time.
Item has been equated more than once.
Items that share IRI values are being equated.
